meta.title: Inteco Energo | Leading Energy Construction Company in Armenia
meta.description: Inteco Energo LLC provides high-quality and reliable energy solutions, specializing in construction services in Armenia and Artsakh. Reliable power supply, energy loss reduction, and modern technologies.

footer.description: Inteco Energo CJSC is a leading construction company providing reliable and high-quality energy solutions.

serviceList.serviceExcerpt: Electric networks are vital for industry and communications.
The power supply system is reliable, safe, and long-lasting.
The company has extensive experience in cable works.

videoCta.title: One of Armenia's Largest Construction Companies
videoCta.text: Inteco Energo CJSC, founded in 2017, is one of Armenia's leading construction companies, carrying out diverse construction work in residential, public, and energy sectors, and is a key contractor for the Armenian Electrical Networks.

featureList.featureDescription: We strive to provide high quality in all of our provided services.
We ensure a high level of safety in all our projects and services.

about.title: Completed Projects
projectList: Overhaul of transformer and distribution substations

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: Inteco Energo  CJSC was founded in March 2017 and is one of the largest construction companies operating in Armenia. We carry out various construction works in the residential, public and energy sector. For a long time, being one of the qualified contractors of the Armenian electric grid, we have carried out large-scale work on the construction, reconstruction and re-equipment of energy infrastructures in Armenia and Artsakh.

list.content: We are committed to providing reliable and uninterrupted power supply to our customers.
Our projects contribute to increasing the stability of the energy system.
We reduce energy losses using the most modern technologies.

1.title: Construction, reconstruction and repair works of power transmission substations
1.description: Power grids and power supply are the pillars of the industry for telecommunications operators and service companies. "Inteco Energo" CJSC has gained a reputation in the market as a reliable partner and a supplier of modern technologies for the electricity industry by providing a systematic approach to the construction of high and low voltage electrical networks, optical grounding wires and transmission lines, as well as by supplying and installing power transformer substations and alternative energy systems.

2.title: Electrification
2.description: Durability, reliability and safety are important characteristics of the power supply system. All electrical installation works are carried out in accordance with high quality standards, cables and equipment of reliable and well-known manufacturers are used. We carry out construction work of 0,22 kW, 0,4kW, 6 kW, 10kW, 35kW and 110 kW substations and cable lines.

3.title: Aerial and underground cable work
3.description: During long-term work, the Company has gained rich experience in aerial and underground cable work. The main advantage of the company is its highly qualified, certified, experienced engineers and specialists. The company provides a complete set of services: design of general networks, design of power transmission and distribution lines, all necessary permits, patents, design and planning documents, supply of cables and materials, installation works.
